resources.string:
Major changes to the way the call detail buttons are configured and used
 Buttons are no longer optional, you have to have them
 You can configure up to 6 buttons If a callback number is configured, you will first be given the choice of Not Responding or Responding buttons. If there is something for the Ack button to do, it will be shown by itself until you acknowledge the call. Then you get to the regular button menu, which no longer includes an Ack button
 There is a new Close App button that closes both the call display and call history windows
 
 New Locations:
 Waterford Town, CT
 Suffolk County, NY (alt)
 King George County, VA
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Delmar, DE
 Calvert County, MD
 Prince Georges County, MD
 Salem County, NJ
 Genesee County, NY
 Suffolk County, NY
 Sampson County, NC
 Delaware County, OH
 Hamilton County, OH
 Delaware County, PA
 Chester County, PA
 Lehigh County, PA
 
 General Fixes:
 Fixed problem with odd calls coming up when Cadpage is first launched
